reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and comfortable, with positive feedback about its stretchiness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for party
items.body: Wore this to a corporate Christmas party and it was perfect! Not too short or revealing for my height of 5’5”. Stretchy enough for a big meal! The fabric was soft and not see through at all. Great price for what I got! Read more
items.author: Megan McWhorter

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and just like the image shown!
items.body: It is a good dress, and it looks exactly as advertised, here's my issue with it, the length... it is very short and it rides up throughout the event you wear it to. Sizing is pretty accurate, the material is pretty stretchy so it makes each size range pretty comfortable! Overall I give this dress a 8/10 , I bought this as a last minute option and I ended up really liking it. Read more
items.author: Kat3

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars covered in deodorant stains
items.body: The dress is so flattering and cute, perfect for casual going out events. Unfortunately, I received what was very evidently a pre-used or at the very least pre-returned dress. It was inside out, and covered in various deodorant marks and stains. So be cautious when buying that this might be an issue because it's a little gross honestly when you've paid full price for something supposedly new. Right now I wouldn't recommend. Read more
items.author: McKenzies

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for VDAY!!! <3
items.body: this dress is SO cute! Im always hesitant ordering dresses off of Amazon but I love this dress. I got it for Valentine's day! The material is a little thicker, and kinda elasticey, but it fits nice on the body but it is short. I will be wearing some shapewear with it, but ts cute and comfortable! I ordered a M, 5'5 around 150 pounds. Fit great! Read more
items.author: Olivia H

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Do not get this.
items.body: I repeat, do not get this dress. I feel bad writing this but I don't want you to make the same mistake I made. I saw so many mixed reviews from "this is so cute and a great dress" to "it looks cheap, don't get it". I took a chance in trusting the good reviews and I wish I didn't bother. I planned to wear this dress for new years eve. Upon opening the package, I noticed that the color was a more pinky red that a deep red. Taking it out of the package was more disappointing when I noticed how cheap looking the material was. I mean, this dress looks like a shiny gym legging kind of fabric. It made me look and feel cheap. Which was the total opposite of what I was going for. I gave this dress two stares because the cut of the dress was spot on. If it was a different material and the correct color, I think this would be an amazing dress. The off the shoulder ribbon tie would of been extremely cute if this material was good. Also, if you do have a lil tummy to show, this dress shows it all plus more!! I wanted to post a picture of me wearing it but honestly I was embarrassed to even show you guys, that's how bad this dress material was. I say for $40 don't waste your time or money on this dress. You can find something way better! Read more
items.author: Ameliya

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars One arm was much longer than the other side.
items.body: One arm was much longer than the other side. Ordered two sizes and same issue with both. Read more
items.author: ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is amazing!
items.body: Highly suggest this dress. Good quality, comfortable, stretchy and worth the money. I think it’s very flattering no matter the body type. Looks great with or without tights Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: I’m typically a small in most shirts and a medium or size 6 jeans bc I have hips and a butt. I ordered a medium and it fits great, I wish it was a little longer but bought it for the rodeo and it will definitely do the trick for the night. Arrived early which was nice, got the blue color and it wasn’t see through or thin that you could see everything. The ribbon is cheap and really long but you can cut it and be fine. Overall I’m happy Read more
items.author: Reagan Dutton

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Boat Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Boat Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Soft Light Grey, Soft Berry, Burgundy, Dark Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
